original_text: And there came against Gibeah 10,000 chosen men out of all Israel, and the battle was hard, but the Benjaminites did not know that disaster was close upon them.
korean_text: 온 이스라엘 사람 중에서 택한 사람 만 명이 기브아에 이르러 치매 싸움이 치열하나 베냐민 사람은 화가 자기에게 미친 줄을 알지 못하였더라

sentences.original_text: And there came against Gibeah 10,000 chosen men
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 기브아를 치러 만 명의 뽑힌 용사들이 나아왔고

sentences.original_text: but the Benjaminites did not know
that disaster was close upon them
